attr.title: Infested
attr.desc: A point-and-click game where you must find your way through an infested space ship and discover a way to escape using the resources and environment around you.
attr.inst: Download the Infested - Windows version for free at itch.io (https://grahfmetal.itch.io/infested) and copy it (an .exe file) into this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the *Infested - Windows version* for free at [itch.io](https://grahfmetal.itch.io/infested) and copy it (an *.exe* file) into this port's *gamedata* folder.
